storyTitle: As Department Manager, I want to generate performance reports to achieve insights into team productivity and quality metrics

testCases.title: Generate performance report with selected KPIs
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has access to Performance Reporting module
At least one team exists in the system
Task and attendance data is available for the selected time period
Performance database is accessible and populated

steps.action: Navigate to Performance Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance report UI is displayed with KPI options, filter controls, and report generation button visible

steps.action: Select desired KPIs from the available options (e.g., task completion rate, attendance percentage, quality metrics)
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and added to the report configuration

steps.action: Apply filters for team by selecting a specific team from the dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Team filter is applied and displayed in the active filters section

steps.action: Apply time period filter by selecting start and end dates
steps.expectedResult: Time period filter is applied and displayed in the active filters section without validation errors

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button to submit report generation request
steps.expectedResult: Performance report is generated and visualized within 5 seconds showing selected KPIs with charts, graphs, and data tables

postconditions: Performance report is displayed on screen
Report contains all selected KPIs
Applied filters are reflected in the report data
Report generation is logged in system audit trail

testCases.title: Export performance report to PDF and Excel
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has access to Performance Reporting module
Performance report has been successfully generated with KPIs
Browser allows file downloads
User has write permissions to download folder

steps.action: Generate performance report by selecting KPIs, team filter, and time period, then clicking 'Generate Report'
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed with visualizations including charts, graphs, and data tables showing selected KPIs

steps.action: Locate and click the 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is generated and downloaded to the default download location with filename containing report name and timestamp

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF opens successfully and contains all report data including visualizations, KPIs, filters applied, and data tables matching the on-screen report

steps.action: Return to the performance report screen and click the 'Export to Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: Excel file is generated and downloaded to the default download location with filename containing report name and timestamp

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens successfully and contains all report data in structured format with separate sheets for different KPIs, data tables, and chart representations

postconditions: PDF file is saved in download folder with correct data
Excel file is saved in download folder with correct data
Both exported files contain accurate report information
Export actions are logged in system audit trail
Original report remains displayed on screen

testCases.title: Verify integration of task and attendance data in performance report
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has access to Performance Reporting module
Task database contains task completion data for the selected team
Attendance database contains attendance records for the selected team
User has access to view source task and attendance data for verification
Test team with known task and attendance data exists

steps.action: Navigate to Performance Reporting section and select a specific team from the team filter dropdown
steps.expectedResult: Team is selected and filter is applied

steps.action: Select KPIs that include both task-related metrics (e.g., task completion rate) and attendance-related metrics (e.g., attendance percentage)
steps.expectedResult: Both task and attendance KPIs are selected and displayed in the configuration

steps.action: Select a time period and click 'Generate Report'
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed with integrated data showing both task and attendance metrics in a unified view with visualizations

steps.action: Access the task database directly or through task management module and retrieve task completion data for the same team and time period
steps.expectedResult: Task source data is retrieved showing number of completed tasks, pending tasks, and completion rates

steps.action: Compare task metrics in the performance report against the source task data
steps.expectedResult: Report data matches source data with 100% accuracy for task completion rates, total tasks, and other task-related KPIs

steps.action: Access the attendance database directly or through attendance module and retrieve attendance records for the same team and time period
steps.expectedResult: Attendance source data is retrieved showing attendance percentages, absences, and attendance patterns

steps.action: Compare attendance metrics in the performance report against the source attendance data
steps.expectedResult: Report data matches source data with 100% accuracy for attendance percentages, total days, and other attendance-related KPIs

steps.action: Review the visualized trends in the report including line charts, bar graphs, and trend indicators
steps.expectedResult: Trends accurately reflect performance over time showing increases, decreases, or stability in both task and attendance metrics consistent with the underlying data

postconditions: Data integrity is confirmed between report and source systems
Task and attendance data integration is verified
Report accuracy is validated at 95% or higher
Visualizations correctly represent the integrated data
Verification results are documented

storyTitle: As Department Manager, I want to visualize performance trends over time to achieve better understanding of productivity changes

testCases.title: View performance trend visualization for selected time period
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has access to Performance Reporting module
Performance database contains historical data for multiple time periods
At least one team has performance data spanning the selected time period
Visualization library is loaded and functional

steps.action: Navigate to Performance Reporting section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance report UI is displayed with KPI selection options, time period selectors, and visualization area

steps.action: Select performance KPIs from the available options (e.g., productivity score, task completion rate, quality metrics)
steps.expectedResult: Selected KPIs are highlighted and added to the visualization configuration

steps.action: Select a time period by choosing start date and end date from the date pickers (e.g., last 3 months)
steps.expectedResult: Time period selections are accepted, validated, and displayed in the active filters section without errors

steps.action: Click 'View Trends' or 'Generate Visualization' button
steps.expectedResult: Trend visualization renders within 5 seconds displaying line charts or area graphs showing selected KPIs over the chosen time period

steps.action: Examine the trend visualization for data points, trend lines, and axis labels
steps.expectedResult: Visualization displays accurate performance trends with clear data points for each time interval, properly labeled axes, legend showing KPIs, and trend indicators (upward/downward)

steps.action: Hover over data points on the visualization
steps.expectedResult: Tooltips appear showing exact values, dates, and KPI names for each data point

postconditions: Performance trend visualization is displayed on screen
Visualization accurately represents data for selected time period
All selected KPIs are visible in the trend chart
Visualization is interactive and responsive
User can interpret productivity changes from the trends

testCases.title: Export performance report with visualizations
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager
User has access to Performance Reporting module
Performance report with trend visualizations has been generated
Visualizations are fully rendered on screen
Browser allows file downloads
User has write permissions to download folder

steps.action: Generate performance report by selecting KPIs and time period, then viewing trend visualizations
steps.expectedResult: Report is displayed with trend visualizations including line charts, graphs showing performance over time, and data tables

steps.action: Verify that all visualizations are fully loaded and displayed correctly on screen
steps.expectedResult: All charts, graphs, and visual elements are rendered completely with no missing components

steps.action: Locate and click the 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: PDF generation process initiates and PDF file is downloaded to the default download location with filename containing report name and timestamp

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file using a PDF reader
steps.expectedResult: PDF opens successfully and contains all report content including trend visualizations rendered as images, charts are clear and readable, data tables are formatted properly, and all KPIs and time period information are included

steps.action: Verify that visualizations in the PDF match the on-screen visualizations
steps.expectedResult: Visualizations in PDF are identical to on-screen versions with same data points, trend lines, colors, labels, and formatting intact

postconditions: PDF file is saved in download folder
PDF contains complete report with visualizations intact
Visualizations in exported PDF are accurate and readable
Export action is logged in system audit trail
Original report remains displayed on screen for further use

storyTitle: As Department Manager, I want to export performance reports in PDF format to achieve standardized reporting

testCases.title: Export performance report to PDF
preconditions: User is logged in as Department Manager with valid credentials
User has authorization to access performance reports
Performance report data is available in the system
Browser supports PDF file downloads
Network connection is stable

steps.action: Navigate to the performance reports section from the main dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Performance reports page loads successfully and displays available report options

steps.action: Select the desired date range and filters for the performance report
steps.expectedResult: Filter options are applied and system acknowledges the selection

steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button
steps.expectedResult: Performance report is generated and displayed on screen with all relevant data, charts, and visualizations

steps.action: Verify that the report contains expected data including metrics, graphs, and tables
steps.expectedResult: Report displays complete performance data with proper formatting and all visualizations are rendered correctly

steps.action: Locate and click the 'Export to PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: Export process initiates and a loading indicator appears

steps.action: Wait for the PDF export to complete
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is generated and downloaded to the default download location within 5 seconds, and a success notification is displayed

steps.action: Navigate to the download location and locate the downloaded PDF file
steps.expectedResult: PDF file is present with a meaningful filename including report name and timestamp

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file using a PDF reader application
steps.expectedResult: PDF file opens successfully without errors

steps.action: Verify that the PDF contains all performance data from the original report
steps.expectedResult: All data points, metrics, and text content match the original report displayed on screen

steps.action: Verify that all charts and visualizations are properly rendered in the PDF
steps.expectedResult: All graphs, charts, and visual elements are clearly visible, properly formatted, and maintain their original appearance

steps.action: Check the overall formatting and layout of the PDF document
steps.expectedResult: PDF maintains professional formatting with proper headers, footers, page breaks, and consistent styling throughout the document

postconditions: PDF file is successfully saved in the download directory
Original performance report remains accessible in the application
Export action is logged in the system audit trail
User can perform additional exports if needed
No data corruption or loss occurs during export process
